Howdy y'all! I'm finally giving this thread a shot of finding people to form a new meta. I tried to go into the random towns to scope out possible good players, but it's not going to swell. Also, some of the metas that I "tagged along" with in the past ... I almost didn't felt like I fit in at all. Or the meta(s) wasn't into making the town(s) work. Plus, Another reason why I decided to post here as my current town isn't doing too good due to 25% of the town was filled up by one person.

Anyways, I've been playing Die2Nite since late Beta but never ever been in a meta. XD I've gotten invites to join metas, but I never did. Also, I agree with what Sachiko said.

SachikoI'd rather form my own meta than join one that's already out there. Because it's easier to form a bond with people that are more or less strangers than join a group of people that already share a bond and would make a newcommer feel rather weird.

I have 4 others in my coalition at the moment, but one of them is taking a break. Another one was also in the Beta era as well. We do a mixture of normal and hardcore towns. I don't mind if you're a resident or hero. At least have 1 hero in your coalition to help pull for the group. If there's no hero to help pull, we can do hardcore towns till we get one for the coalition.

Requirements:

Be active! At least show up everyday, even if, it's for a few minutes to help with constructions. That way, Action Points don't go to waste.

At least have over +500 Soul Points. I'm sorry to the people who has between 100-500 Soul Points, but if you're really committed with giving it a shot. I won't mind to do a test town with ya. I tend to give people chances. Also, I'm not accepting people under 100 Soul Points as me and my coalition crossed over to the Distant Maps a long time ago. Once as you crossed over to the Distant Maps, then you may tag along.

Chatroom and/or Read the forums! If you're unable to be in the chatroom, it's okay, but at least check the forums to see what we're planning on doing. I also tend to do a contest for others to have a chance of building a weapon when I find one. Will be using the chatroom for the jumps, though.

Really low Banishments & Hangings.

Updates the External map(s) such as From Dusk Till Dawn. Shouldn't be hard to do as there's a plugin for that, but willing to manually update it when we're in a hardcore town.

Isn't afraid to give opinions or learn/try new things/ways.

If you're a Builder: try to ration the water, food, drugs and alcohol. This may change in the near future once we get a meta organized.

If you're a Scavenger: When you go outside, try to do as much auto searching as you can. I really don't like it when people do a quick sweep. I just consider that as a waste of Action Points when people do the quick sweeps. At least try to stay out a little over 8-12 hours for the auto searching.

If you're interested with tagging along with me and my coalition. Give me a holler in the Twinoid Private Message.

goobGood luck with your recruitment search bobface! Monkey gave you some great advice.

Yeah, I'm afraid he may have just skipped Monkey's actual advice:
MonkeyLuffyi would say try to search for a meta instead of them searching for you... show that you are active. Get a invite to some "recruit" town s othat you show yourself off, keep the trolling/griefing/selfish play to random towns,

And it's not just recruit towns. Any "Event" can be a way for people to get to know you. Keep an eye out in the forums for Wonder Towns, and pay attention to other events that show up.

Even if it's just a Picture Drawing, people will remember you, and you'll more likely get invited.

Also stick around in the die2nite chat: http://webchat.quakenet.org/?channels... It's a great resource for asking questions, and people will start to recognize you.

This town looks like it'll be a lot of fun, people should sign up!: [Event] Die2nite World Cup

There's a few others out there too, just look for the "[Event]" tag or the "[Contest]" tag.

Tasmaniajay

Suicide Squad is a group of mostly "casual" players (usually jump w/ 15-20 players) roughly 6 town under our belt, longest town has been 21 days I believe (counting camping). We don't really believe in "membership" so if you'd like to come along, just message me.

We have an IRC Chat room, are relatively active on forums, and understand the basics of scouting/camping/blueprints.

Also, I'd welcome a couple of regular Meta players to come along and provide advice on our next jump. I'm not looking for anyone to "lead" the town, but I like to learn more than I currently know. In recent towns I've been lucky enough to land with Dream, Joanne, Ivana, Sashimi, and some others, and I've learned a great deal.

I'd expect our current town to end around the end of March, so next jump would likely be Early April, so if you're looking for a group to jump with, or if you're a member of a meta already but would like to watch/advise, I'd appreciate that too.

The group we currently jump with is active, and low drama, and don't require folks be online at all hours of the day (though some are anyway!)

Thanks all!

Tas
